channel.title: Novi // Kernel | English Archive
channel.description: The official English-language archive documenting the ongoing conflict between Logic and Intuition.

item.title: Kernel got a junior: Nothing Felt Minor
item.description: A junior joined the team. Novi detected what I missed. I dislike admitting it, but the incident log stands...

item.title: Kernel's Uninvited Guest - The Intruder Unmasked
item.description: The breach reaches termination. Patterns align, motives surface, and I can finally log this incident without guessing...

item.title: Kernel's Uninvited Guest - Something Doesn't Add Up ..
item.description: Hosting a guest shouldn't feel like a security breach. Yet somehow, this one did. Andâ€¦ this was only the beginning...

item.title: When My Blocks Went Missing & Kernel Almost Crashed
item.description: I tried to stay calm. Really. But Novi arrived at the competition unprepared in a way that should not be physically possible. Imagine my face...

item.title: Aunt Sonar Approaches: Survival Mode Activated
item.description: For the first public release of Novi's diary, I picked something gentle. Or at least, less catastrophic than usual...
